title: InkRecognizer doesn't find any recognizers for windows mobile 10. we need support for mobile
body: I was digging into the new Ink API's and found out that the Inking works well for both PC and Mobile. But then i found out that when trying to recognize what I wrote, on PC it finds the necessary handwriting packages, (en-US etc) when developing we can set a default. For Mobile the API finds nothing and there is no way to download any handwriting packages in the settings. I tried both C# and vb.net

comments.body: Yes, I too wasted time due to this missing feature. I wouldn't have attempted it if the API documentation said mobile wasn't supported. Instead, you get the impression everything will be fine for mobile. Coming soon* no doubt....
